collection.title: Tools for Deeper Sleep
collection.body_html: Waking up tired is often a sign of poor sleep quality. This collection features our most effective tools for achieving deeper, more restorative, and uninterrupted sleep. Block out disruptions and support your body's natural sleep cycle to wake up feeling truly refreshed and energised.

products.title: Acousticax White Noise Speaker with Touch Lights Sound Machine for Sleep & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Acousticax White Noise Speaker with Touch Lights Sound Machine for Sleep & Relaxation

Enhance your sleep and relaxation routine with the Acousticax White Noise Speaker with Touch Lights. Featuring soothing white noise, ambient sounds, and touch-controlled RGB lighting, this compact speaker helps create a calm environment at home, office, or while traveling.

How to Use:

  1. Connect the speaker to power via USB.

  2. Touch the top to cycle through colorful ambient lights.

  3. Play white noise or relaxing sounds for deep sleep and stress relief.

Specifications:

  • Power Type: USB Rechargeable

  • Functions: White noise, ambient sounds, touch RGB lights

  • Color: White / Black

  • Material: Plastic

  • Size: Compact & portable

Why You’ll Love It:

  • White noise and relaxing sounds block distractions for better sleep

  • Touch-controlled RGB lights with multiple colors for soothing ambiance

  • Non-circulating speaker design ensures stable, clear audio

  • Compact, lightweight, and portable for bedside, office, or travel

  • Energy-efficient and ideal for adults, children, or babies

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Acousticax White Noise Speaker with Touch Lights

  • 1 x USB Charging Cable

  • 1 x User Manual

products.title: Aetherat White Noise Bluetooth Speaker Instrument Player for Relaxation & Sleep
products.body_html:
Aetherat White Noise Bluetooth Speaker Instrument Player for Relaxation & Sleep

Experience a soothing and restful sleep with the Aetherat White Noise Bluetooth Speaker, designed to combine natural scenario music, true stereo sound, and versatile playback options. Perfect for bedtime, meditation, office relaxation, or travel, this sleep instrument helps reduce stress and improves sleep quality.

Featuring Bluetooth connectivity, USB support, and TFAUX playback, the speaker allows you to stream your favorite calming sounds effortlessly. Its compact design and 1500mAh rechargeable battery ensure portability and long-lasting performance. The dual 3W speakers and vibration mode provide immersive, high-quality audio for a full relaxation experience.

Key Features:

  • White Noise & Natural Music: Supports sleep, meditation, and relaxation with true stereo sound.

  • Bluetooth & USB Playback: Stream audio from devices or play via USB/TFAUX.

  • Long Battery Life: 1500mAh battery for extended sleep sessions.

  • Compact & Portable: Lightweight 20 × 5.8 × 6.8 cm design ideal for bedside or travel.

  • Immersive Audio Experience: Dual 3W speakers with vibration mode configuration for deep sound.

Specifications:

  • Material: ABS Plastic

  • Battery Capacity: 1500mAh

  • Speaker Configuration: φ45mm 3Ω3W

  • Vibrating Mode Configuration: 4070

  • Product Power: 3W × 2

  • Product Features: Natural scenario music, Bluetooth audio, true stereo, USB/TFAUX support

  • Product Size: 20 × 5.8 × 6.8 cm

  • Accessories: USB MICRO charging cable

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Portable white noise speaker for relaxation & sleep
✔ Supports Bluetooth, USB, and TFAUX playback
✔ True stereo sound with vibration mode for immersive audio
✔ Compact and stylish for bedroom, office, or travel
✔ Battery-powered for uninterrupted use

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Aetherat Bluetooth Speaker

  • 1 × Charging Cable

Made from soft, breathable fabric, BlissLoom is ideal for year-round use—whether on your bed, sofa, or during quiet relaxation time. Durable and versatile, it adds both comfort and coziness to your everyday routine.

  • Better Sleep Support – Encourages deeper, more restful sleep.

  • Soft & Breathable Fabric – Cozy and skin-friendly for year-round comfort.

  • Multi-Use Design – Perfect for bed, sofa, or naps.

  • Durable & Easy Care – Made for long-lasting everyday use.

Wrap yourself in the BlissLoom Weighted Blanket – your partner in comfort, calm, and better sleep.

Blonbar Sleep Aid White Noise Fan Natural Sound Device for Restful Sleep & Relaxation

Drift into deep, restful sleep with the Blonbar Sleep Aid White Noise Fan Sound Device. Designed to recreate calming natural sounds, this device helps reduce stress, mask environmental noise, and promote relaxation. Ideal for bedrooms, offices, or travel, it provides a soothing atmosphere for better sleep.

Featuring mechanical control and timing functions, you can set your preferred duration easily. Its headphone output allows personal listening without disturbing others, while USB power ensures convenience and portability.

Key Features:

  • White Noise & Fan Sounds: Natural sound options for sleep, meditation, or relaxation.

  • Timing Function: Set your preferred duration for uninterrupted rest.

  • Headphone Output: Personal listening without disturbing others.

  • USB-Powered: Convenient and portable for home or travel use.

  • Mechanical Control: Simple and easy-to-use interface.

Specifications:

  • Function: Timing, music function

Chronos White Noise Machine – Type-C Rechargeable Sleep Aid for Relaxation & Soothing

Enjoy deep, uninterrupted rest with the Chronos White Noise Machine, designed to create a calm, soothing atmosphere for sleep, relaxation, or focus. With a built-in 1200mAh battery and Type-C fast charging, this compact device ensures reliable use whether at home, in the office, or while travelling.

The timed shutdown function helps save energy, allowing you to set your relaxation routine without worrying about turning it off. Its portable, lightweight design makes it ideal for babies, adults, and anyone who needs a peaceful sleep environment.

  • Fast Type-C Charging: Efficient and modern USB-C input for quick recharges.

products.title: Harmonial White Noise Instrument Natural Sound Sleep Aid for Deep Relaxation & Restful Sleep
products.body_html:
Harmonial White Noise Instrument Natural Sound Sleep Aid for Deep Relaxation & Restful Sleep

Experience customizable relaxation and improved sleep with the Harmonial White Noise Sleep Instrument. Combining white noise, fan sounds, and natural sounds, this sleep aid allows you to create your own soothing environment for bedrooms, offices, or travel.

Featuring mechanical control and precise volume sliders, you can mix up to 255 sound combinations including cafés, crickets, rainstorms, birds, and waves. The built-in timer function (30/60/90 minutes) ensures automatic shut-off, making it safe and convenient. Powered via USB with a 1.8m cord and Type-C adapter, it’s simple to set up anywhere.

Key Features:

  • Customizable Sound Combinations: 8 white noise + 8 fan + 8 natural sounds; DIY up to 255 combinations.

  • High-Quality Audio: Clear, smooth sound without obvious loop playback.

  • Timing Function: 30/60/90 minutes with LED indicator and automatic shut-off.

  • Mechanical Control & Volume Sliders: Easy adjustment of total and individual channel volumes.

  • USB-Powered: Convenient 1.8m power cord and Type-C 5V adapter for desktop or bedside use.

Specifications:

  • Power Supply Mode: USB

  • Function: Timing

  • Control Method: Mechanical

  • White Noise Options: 8 types

  • Fan Sounds: 8 types

  • Natural Sounds: 8 types (cafés, crickets, fire, rainstorms, thunder, waves, birds, poultry)

  • DIY Combinations: Up to 255

  • Volume Control: Individual channel & total volume sliders

  • Timer: 30 / 60 / 90 minutes, LED indicator

  • Cable: 1.8m USB cord, Type-C 5V 2A adapter

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Customizable white noise and natural sound combinations
✔ High-quality audio output for uninterrupted relaxation
✔ Automatic shut-off with timer function
✔ Mechanical controls for easy adjustment
✔ USB-powered for portable, desktop, or bedside use

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Harmonial White Noise Sleep Instrument

  • 1 × Data Cable

  • 1 × Plug

  • 1 × Color Box

Product Image：

products.title: Pebbleo White Portable Noise Machine Baby Sleep Device for Sleeping & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Pebbleo White Portable Noise Machine Baby Sleep Device for Sleeping & Relaxation

Help your baby—or yourself—enjoy peaceful, uninterrupted sleep with the Pebbleo White Noise Machine. Featuring 9 soothing sound options including rain, sea waves, thunder, wind, running water, light music, guqin, sky sound, and prenatal music, this device creates a calm environment for relaxation.

Designed with automatic timing functions (15, 30, 60 minutes) and a volume control knob, Pebbleo allows precise customization to suit your needs. Its lightweight, portable design makes it perfect for home, office, travel, or nursery use. The high-fidelity music chip ensures pure, clear sound, while the soft indicator light creates a cozy atmosphere.

Key Features:

  • 9 Soothing Sounds: Rain, sea, thunder, wind, running water, light music, guqin, sky sound, prenatal music

  • Automatic Timer: Choose 15, 30, or 60 minutes with automatic shut-off

  • Portable & Lightweight: Ideal for home, travel, office, daycare, or dorms

  • High-Fidelity Sound: Ensures pure, calming audio for relaxation

  • Soft Indicator Light: Adds to a comfortable sleep environment

  • Long-Lasting Battery: Built-in high-energy lithium battery for extended use

Specifications:

  • Power: 4-AA Battery

  • Voltage: 5VDC 300mA

  • Rated Power: 1.5W

  • Box Size: 16.5 × 16 × 6.3 cm

  • Standards: European ROHS

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Helps babies and adults fall asleep faster
✔ Blocks distractions with soothing white noise
✔ Adjustable timer for customized sleep sessions
✔ Portable for use anywhere—home, travel, or office
✔ Creates a calm and relaxing atmosphere

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Pebbleo White Noise Machine (Gray Card Box Packaging)

  • 1 × USB Cable

Crafted from soft, stretchable, and machine-washable fabric, the Sleep Pod is perfect for napping, lounging, or all-night sleep. Unlike traditional weighted blankets, its wearable design offers freedom of movement while still providing soothing pressure to help you unwind.

  • Original Wearable Weighted Blanket – Gentle compression for stress relief and relaxation.

  • Wearable Design – Cocoon-like comfort with freedom of movement.

This all-in-one device combines white noise, a night light, and a humidifier, along with aroma therapy and 8 nature sound groups.   4. Adjust the night light brightness and color as desired.

products.title: Zonai White Noise Machine USB Rechargeable Sleep Sound Machine for Sleeping & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Zonai White Noise Machine USB Rechargeable Sleep Sound Machine for Sleeping & Relaxation

Create a quiet, relaxing environment with the Zonai Noise Machine, perfect for babies, adults, offices, dorms, or travel. This compact device delivers 9 natural sounds, including white noise, sound waves, bird songs, waterfalls, crickets, quarrels, and lullabies, helping you fall asleep faster and enjoy deep, restorative rest.

Its portable design (8×8×3.3cm) makes it ideal for bedside tables or travel bags, while the USB rechargeable lithium battery provides up to 36 hours of continuous use. The automatic shutdown timer (15/30/60 minutes) and adjustable breathing light promote relaxation and energy savings.

Key Features:

  • 9 Soothing Sound Types: White noise, sound wave, bird songs, waterfall, crickets, quarrels, lullabies, and more.

  • Portable & Compact: Small size fits on bedside tables or travel bags (8×8×3.3cm).

  • Timer & Energy Saving: Automatic shutdown after 15, 30, or 60 minutes.

  • Relaxing Light Display: Adjustable breathing light for added calmness.

  • USB Rechargeable: Built-in lithium battery with up to 36 hours continuous use.

  • Versatile Use: Ideal for baby nurseries, bedrooms, offices, dorms, or travel.
